welcome_message_body: Welcome to Baku, the vibrant capital of Azerbaijan! Get ready to explore the city's rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories.

restaurants.name: Chirag Lobbi Bar
restaurants.description: Chirag Lobbi Bar is a arepa restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: IST Food
restaurants.description: IST Food is a sandwich spot located in the city.

restaurants.name: McDonald's
restaurants.description: McDonald's is a fast food restaurant located in Bakı.
restaurants.address: Nəsimi r, Tiflis Prospekti, 3007. Məhəllə (Bravo Hipermarket), 1000 Bakı

restaurants.name: S&F BEER
restaurants.description: S&F BEER is a bistro located in the city.

restaurants.name: Nakhish
restaurants.description: Nakhish is a restaurant located in Bakı.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Heydar Aliyev International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights, with modern facilities and amenities.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
